Activity: Log in, check emails. Address any questions from staff regarding the training schedule.
Prepare for the first training session. Ensure all materials are readily available.
Conduct the first training session: Focus on clarity, engagement, and addressing participant questions.
Debrief after the first training session. Document lessons learned and identify areas for improvement.
Email @helpdesk-1 Help Desk Support: Alert them about the training and potential increase in EHR-related questions from staff.
Lunch Break - grab a quick bite, review notes from training session
Conduct the second training session. Incorporate improvements based on feedback from the first session.
Debrief after the second training session. Document lessons learned.
Review feedback from the QA Tester. Begin incorporating their feedback.
Schedule follow-up training sessions for staff who were unable to attend the first sessions. Coordinate with @itpm-1 for scheduling and notifications.
Wrap up for the day. Save all work and log out.
